name: <CH4055>
description:
This is a game about a supernatural kid trying to escape the government's research facility.

Use his powers and solve puzzles to escape.

Don't get caught.

Controls: WASD to move, left mouse button to transform into a ghost, right mouse button to attack

Ghost Controls: Space and S to move up and down

The game was made by our special team:

Ue4guy - Lead Programmer

Kraken - Programmer 2

MinouMinou - 3D Artist

NRdevs- 3D Artist 2

Furamoda - SFX Designer

DaforLynx - Composer

M0sstryx - 2D Artist
